GetPatientInfoSpecimenResponse.GetPatientInfoSpecimenResult: <Info><PatientId>0000000025</PatientId><InpNO>316001</InpNO><VisitId>IP0000000001</VisitId><Name>石国强</Name><NamePhonetic></NamePhonetic><Sex>男</Sex><DateOfBirth>1964-01-01</DateOfBirth><BirthPlace></BirthPlace><Citizenship>中国</Citizenship><Nation>汉族</Nation><IDNO></IDNO><Identity></Identity><ChargeType>自费</ChargeType><MailingAddress>广东珠海</MailingAddress><ZipCode></ZipCode><PhoneNumberHome>13662330690</PhoneNumberHome><PhoneNumbeBusiness></PhoneNumbeBusiness><NextOfKin></NextOfKin><RelationShip></RelationShip><NextOfKinAddr></NextOfKinAddr><NextOfKinZipCode></NextOfKinZipCode><NextOfKinPhome></NextOfKinPhome><DeptCode>13031003@GZWKSQ-肝脏外科三区</DeptCode><BedNO>104</BedNO><AdmissionDateTime>2010-11-24 08:14:05</AdmissionDateTime><DoctorInCharge>830154@凌云彪</DoctorInCharge><ScheduleId></ScheduleId><DiagBeforeOperation>胆囊息肉!慢性胆囊炎!胆囊息肉</DiagBeforeOperation><ScheduledDateTime></ScheduledDateTime><OperatingRoom></OperatingRoom><Surgeon></Surgeon><InPatPreillness>患者2月前无明显原因出现右上腹隐痛,以剑突下明显,无肩背部放射痛,无发热,无恶心、呕吐,患者未行进一步处理、一月前患者再次觉得右上腹隐痛,查转氨酶提示胆红素升高（TB25umol/l）,遂用优思弗、消炎利胆片治疗。我院彩超提示胆囊息肉,慢性胆囊炎。今为进一步治疗,于我院就诊,门诊拟“胆囊炎、胆管结石"收入我科,患者起病以来,精神睡眠可,胃纳可,大小便异常,体重无明显下降。</InPatPreillness><InPatPastillness>2年前患者曾因“右腹股沟斜疝"行“右腹股沟斜疝无张力修补术"。否认肝炎、结核等传染性疾病史。否认高血压、糖尿病、冠心病等慢性病史。无外伤、输血及血液制品史。未发现食物、药物过敏史。预防接种史不详。</InPatPastillness><InPatFamillness></InPatFamillness></Info>
